text:
fade_categories = (sortMethod) ->
    $.ajax
      url: '/sort'
      data: {
        "sortMethod" : sortMethod,
        "category"   : // The current path is /categories/<Category>
      }
      success: (newList) ->
        $("ul#categories").fadeOut "slow", ->
          $(this).replaceWith(newList)
          $("ul#categories").fadeIn "slow"
    return false
